attributes.action: Improve the skatepark in Macclesfield, Cheshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The skatepark in Macclesfield, Cheshire is old and rotting away. There is only a small ramp that becomes repetative after a while. We desperately want the government to improve this skatepark and add more things to skateboard on.
